text: Mogens Palle (14 March 1934 â€“ 27 August 2022) was a Danish professional boxing promoter and manager. In the mid-1960s he was the European manager of Sonny Liston, and in 2001 organized the match between Mike Tyson and Brian Nielsen in Denmark. In 2008, he was honored in the International Boxing Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from melanoma Category:Danish boxers
title: Mogens Palle
